title: The Adventures of Yousef Moore: The Guiding Guardian

story.text: Yousef discovers his ability to see a few minutes into the future while coaching his local youth soccer team to avoid potential injuries on the field.
Using his newfound power, Yousef prevents a major accident during rush hour, by guiding a disoriented driver safely off the road.
At the community center, Yousef mentors teens, subtly using his abilities to steer the youth away from making choices that he foresees could lead to trouble.
Yousef receives anonymous threats, warning him against using his powers. He spends the day pondering the source and their motives.
Determined not to surrender to fear, Yousef saves a child from a life-threatening allergic reaction at a school event by foreseeing the incident and advising the teachers ahead of time.
Yousef is approached by a mysterious group who reveal themselves as other future-seers, inviting him to join their network that works globally to prevent disasters.
After a week of heroics and dilemma, Yousef decides to join the group but remains committed to his local community, blending larger missions with his ongoing coaching and mentoring duties.

ending: As the sun sets, Yousef Moore stands ready to face whatever the future holds, with the heart of a hero and the spirit of a mentor.
moral: The greatest power lies in using one's abilities to protect and guide others.
